game.modes

Class XvX

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.modes.XvX
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PvPGameMode

    public abstract class XvX
extends java.lang.Object
    X vs X gamemode where X can be either a player or a computer.

      • firstMoveIsDouble

        protected abstract Position firstMoveIsDouble(int cellNumber)
        Ask the Player which square the first move belongs to. This will be different for Humans and Computers.
        Returns:
        The chosen square number position.
